modName: Fire Dancer Retreat - Home in the Reach
summary: Manor located in the Reach with large basement, smithing area, heating system, large kitchen, indoor gardens, outdoor zen garden, tons of alchemy materials, (basically a personal alchemy garden), a spa, servants quarters, loft bedroom, target practice area, and enchanting/alchemy work spaces.
descriptionHtml:
The Fire Dancer Retreat is a manor located in the Reach just east of Markarth. It was previously owned by an eccentric alchemist interested in growing her ingredients in the basement. For a long time she lived there as a hermit shut-in until the Markarth city officials grew concerned by the vines growing over the house, the thatched roof coming to life, and leaks springing from the stones. They sent in a heath inspector who immediately condemned the house. It\'s said the alchemist just vanished, leaving everything behind. The house reaks of mold, fungus and plants are invading, part of the basement is leaking water, but you seem to find a bit of charm in it. Like a mother\'s love, you discard the eviction notice and make the house your own.

Features:
* Dwemer Heating System
* Spa
* Servants Quarters
* Large Kitchen
* Library
* Amory
* Living room
* Bedroom
* Smithing area
* Enchanting area
* Alchemy work station and garden
* Walk-in Indoor garden / secret area to keep your valuables
* Outdoor zen garden

Thank you Unthray for the video review! You guys can check it out in the video section!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~```
Check out my other player home mods: 
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16515]Windwood Redoubt[/url] a small fort for rouge characters. You can do what you want, be whoever you want, and you have excellent access to travelers on the road. 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16604]Cuilalie Haven[/url] a scenic elven designed player home for the rangers/wood elves who like to be out in nature. Built like a tree house and surrounded by a trellis and the nature around you. 

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17341]Caethspell Caverns[/url] a cave home for the druid nature/animal lover players. Includes a small indoor farm with livestock and crops - waterfall and pool, beautiful decor and scenery
author: Cynster

files.name: FireDancerRetreatV2
files.changelogHtml: Fleshed out the outdoor garden and house decor, greatly reduced the noise, updated the heating system, improved the lighting

files.name: FireDancerRetreatV3
files.changelogHtml: Added a heck of a lot more detail, ensured there were no respawning containers, fixed some lighting issues, added a walk in spa/secret area.
